arts.ttl: West Ham XI vs Wolves – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: West Ham United travel to Wolves in the second round of the Carabao Cup this evening. Graham Potter is under real pressure after a nightmare start to the season. The Hammers are bottom of the Premier League after opening the 2025/26 season with consecutive defeats, conceding eight goals in the process. arts.ttl: Wolves vs West Ham – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Wolves host West Ham United this evening in the second round of the EFL Cup. Both sides have made disappointing starts to the Premier League campaign and will hope to build some momentum in cup competition. Wolves have lost both games and have failed to score in the Premier League to date. arts.ttl: West Ham boss Graham Potter under pressure ahead of Wolves cup clash
arts.sum: It also remains to be seen if Max Kilman - who made a £40million move to West Ham from Wolves in 2024 - will play against his old team. The defender has come under criticism from many West Ham fans for his performances.

arts.ttl: Wolves vs West Ham - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Tuesday's EFL Cup clash between Wolverhampton Wanderers and West Ham United, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
